AGENT_BOTS.DESCRIPTION: AI Agents are intelligent assistants that can handle conversations automatically. They can respond to customer queries, collect information, and transfer conversations to human agents when needed. You can configure each agent with a context prompt to define its behavior and personality.

AVATAR.ERROR_DELETE: Error deleting AI Agent avatar, please try again

BOT_CONFIGURATION.TITLE: Select an AI Agent
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DESC: Assign an AI Agent to your inbox. They can handle initial conversations and transfer them to a live agent when necessary.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not update the AI Agent. Please try again.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DISCONNECTED_ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not disconnect the AI Agent. Please try again.

DESCRIPTION.LABEL: Description
DESCRIPTION.PLACEHOLDER: What does this AI Agent do?

CONTEXT_PROMPT.LABEL: Context prompt
CONTEXT_PROMPT.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the context prompt that defines how the AI Agent should behave, its personality, knowledge base, and response guidelines...

ENABLE_SIGNATURE.LABEL: Enable signature
ENABLE_SIGNATURE.DESCRIPTION: Add AI Agent signature to messages

IS_ACTIVE.LABEL: Active
IS_ACTIVE.DESCRIPTION: Enable or disable this AI Agent

DESCRIPTIONS.AUTO_RESPOND: AI Agent automatically responds to all incoming messages
DESCRIPTIONS.ASSIST_AGENT: AI Agent suggests responses that agents can review and send
DESCRIPTIONS.MANUAL_TRIGGER: AI Agent responds only when triggered manually

INBOXES.LABEL: Connected inboxes
INBOXES.DESCRIPTION: Select which inboxes this AI Agent should be active on

ERRORS.NAME: AI Agent name is required
ERRORS.VALID_URL: Please enter a valid URL starting with http:// or https://

WEBHOOK.DESCRIPTION: Configure a webhook to integrate with your custom AI services. The AI Agent will receive and process events from conversations and can respond to them.

DASHBOARD.TITLE: AI Agents Dashboard
DASHBOARD.DESCRIPTION: Monitor the performance and usage of your AI Agents

MY_AGENTS.TITLE: My Agents
MY_AGENTS.DESCRIPTION: Manage your AI Agents and monitor their performance
